E-Mail Messages
Date: Thursday, 2/6/1984
Subject: Contract offer
FYI- I still prefer the offer from Boston (FBA).
They offer a decent amount more money.

Regards,
Elmer Bensen



Date: Sunday, 2/9/1984
Subject: I'll sign elsewhere
Sorry, Boston (FBA) has made the best overall offer.
I'll sign with them. Good luck this season!

Regards,
Elmer Bensen



Date: Wednesday, 2/12/1984
Subject: Contract offer
You have to be kidding me with your offer.
Offer more money or I will not even think about it.

Regards,
David Maser



Date: Friday, 2/14/1984
Subject: I'll sign elsewhere
Sorry, New Jersey has made the best overall offer.
I'll sign with them. Good luck this season!

Regards,
David Maser



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1984
Subject: Progress of Joseph Clyde
Dear Sir,
Joseph Clyde is doing pretty good at A Longmont Storm!
He has an ERA of 3.03, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director

should demote him before he gets burned.

Regards,
